If the game doesn't start, try lowering the sample rate of your sound-card to 48000 Hz
Control Panel > Sound > select your default playback device > click Properties > Advanced Tab > change the sample rate to 48000 Hz
48000hz fix worked for me... Running windows 7 64 bit home prem.
